reviews.review:
2nd worst game I have ever played, lots of hackers if you are too good at the game. Boring and extremely repetitive, every round feels the same. Ranking system is shit, it should be more like R6's. Only way to have fun in this game is to play custom games with lots of friends. Toxic community, every match you play, you will be tortured by someone.

Save yourself, don't play this game. 



Its amazing. 10/10
Jogo incrivel e com um senario competitivo enorme, porem ultimamente está deixando a desejar com a plataforma cheia de xiters..
